mapper.select: SELECT seq, id, name, subject, score, DATE_FORMAT(exam_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS examDate, prof_id AS profID, prof_name AS profName FROM Record ORDER BY exam_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{articleSize}
SELECT seq, name, subject, score, exam_date AS examDate, prof_id AS profID, prof_name AS profName FROM Record WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT seq, name, subject, score, exam_date AS examDate, prof_id AS profID, prof_name AS profName FROM Record WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT seq, name, subject, score, exam_date AS examDate, prof_id AS profID, prof_name AS profName FROM Record WHERE id = #{id} AND exam_date = #{examDate}
